item.title: Discover Session Report
item.description: License Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/ What is a Discovery Session Report ? Short report template for Discovery Sessions. The problem with some sessions is that the documentation takes too long to produce and can be too extensive. Using the templates ensures a succinct, easy to read report with the key findings. A Discovery Session usually last for 1 day or less and the report should be written with this in mind; should be short, concise and relevant to the workshop.
